## Overview

Welcome to the Spring 2026 semester of **ESPM-288: Reproducible & Collaborative Data Science**. This year, we are diving deep into the **Agent-First Methodology**, exploring how AI agents can augment our ability to solve complex environmental problems. We will be using the R ecosystem (`duckdbfs`, `ellmer`, `shiny`) to architect, prompt, audit, and deploy robust data solutions.
